MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L35 postcode area of Tarbock Green, affecting properties in Whitefield Lane, Cronton Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.32am on 17th of October 2020.
